comptia_a+_1102.question: Which Microsoft Windows 10 edition(s) provide(s) the option to join a domain? (Select all that apply)
A user reports that their PC is running slowly. Disk, CPU, and memory usage seem fine. What should the technician check next?
comptia_a+_1102.answer: Check for malware or a background process consuming resources

comptia_a+_1102.question: What is the purpose of using a high-powered magnet (degausser) on a hard drive?
comptia_a+_1102.answer: To destroy data on the hard drive

comptia_a+_1102.question: Which tool can be used to configure Windows startup programs?
What command is used in Windows to repair the master boot record?
What is the primary purpose of the Event Viewer in Windows?
comptia_a+_1102.answer: To view and manage event logs

comptia_a+_1102.question: Which type of user account in Windows has the most privileges?
What feature of Windows allows for the encryption of individual files?
Which of the following file system types is used primarily for optical discs?
What command would you use to display all active network connections on a Windows machine?
Which Windows feature allows for the restoration of system files to a previous state?
What type of software is designed to support the hardware and software of a computer?
Which of the following is a characteristic of NTFS compared to FAT32?
comptia_a+_1102.answer: NTFS supports larger file sizes and disk quotas

comptia_a+_1102.question: What Windows feature enables the encryption of an entire drive?
Which command-line utility can be used to troubleshoot DNS issues?
What type of malware encrypts user files and demands payment for decryption?
Which port is used by HTTPS?
What is the primary function of the Windows Update utility?
comptia_a+_1102.answer: To keep the operating system up-to-date with patches and updates

comptia_a+_1102.question: What is the purpose of User Account Control (UAC) in Windows?
comptia_a+_1102.answer: To prevent unauthorized changes to the operating system

comptia_a+_1102.question: Which Windows utility can be used to schedule automated tasks?
